text: Nuwamuguze ari mugisagara ca Misiri (Egypte) yaciye abwira umutambukanyi wiwe ati:- nimumutegurire aho azoba uyu mushumvyi nkumbure azotugirira akamaro canke tukazomugena kuba ikibondo cacu, kuri ivyo rero Yussufu twaramutsimbataje muri ico gisagara ca Misiri n’umunezero ntangere kugira ngo tumwigishe ukuri kw’amajambo, n’Imana niyo nyene intsinzi hejuru y’ijambo ryayo mugabo abantu benshi ntanakimwe bazi
